bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: API Behavior: return NOT_SUPPORTED if corresponding nnfw is not installed
bug.description: If the corresponding nnfw (e.g., Tensorflow) is not installed, return "NOT SUPPORTED". Don't try to run it and generate fatal errors.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1834>#1834</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
